aboutFirst: Welcome to Zarpe, your perfect partner for unforgettable events. We specialize in offering gastronomic experiences unique through our innovative snack bars and catering services. From mini panckakes and cold cuts to nacho bars, cocktails and shots, at Zarpe we carryfun and flavor to your event.
aboutSecond: Zarpe is your perfect companion to make it unforgettable. We will work closely with you to understand your vision and create a dining experience that exceeds expectations.
serviceDiscover: Discover a world of flavors with our specialized bars:
serviceNachoDesc: Enjoy the crunchy texture of nachos with the best sauces.
serviceColdCutsDesc: An exquisite selection for lovers of cold cuts and cheeses.
serviceCoctailDesc: Elevate your event with our cocktail and shot creations.
serviceCrepaletsDesc: Crepalettes are a dream come true for crepe and cookie lovers.
serviceSweetSaladDesc: Sweet and salty snacks are the perfect combination for any occasion.
contacText: Follow us on our social networks to stay up to date with our latest creations and events:
contactQR: Scan the code to a quick chat!
contactEvents: At ZARPE, we transform events into unforgettable experiences.
contactMatch: Contact us to make your next event unmatched!
madeFor: This web was made by Alessandro Diaz
